Banner.Description: As a Systems Engineering student, I have been developing technological solutions for over a year, including web interfaces, process automation, and functional testing. I focus on creating clean, reusable code and staying up to date with best development practices and user experience.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I am a developer with experience in systems analysis, frontend/backend development, and technical leadership. I focus on proposing solutions, improving software quality, and generating value. I usually create tools on my own initiative, exploring technologies out of personal interest. I adapt quickly and always seek to learn more.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Technical Team Lead & Internal Solutions Developer
Description: Leader in technical decision-making
Hiring technical talent for the company
Team leader of the technology department
Creation and maintenance of an internal process management platform for course sales
Programming custom functions and plugins for WordPress platform customization
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Planning meetings and reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: WordPress developer
Description: Creation and maintenance of an eCommerce platform in WordPress.
Functional programming in templates and plugins to add necessary features
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Planning meetings and reports.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Freelancer
Description: Continuous improvement implementation, working on frontend and backend.
Creation of platforms with Angular, Laravel, WordPress programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Process automation with data structures.
Transcription of videos and audios into DOCS format
Creation of SQL queries
Application testing
Layout design with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, Bulma, etc.

Designed with Node.js, MongoDB, Angular

Effective communication with the design team, working with Figma

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Ragnarok.pe
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Ragnarok was a landing page developed for a fictional brand, designed with a modern and responsive approach using WordPress and Elementor. The project included full integration of WooCommerce to display products, shopping cart, and online payments. The page was optimized for performance, SEO, and mobile devices.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: AprobandoSinEstudiar
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Aprobandosinestudiar is a collaborative platform aimed at university students, where they can share and access past exams, practice tests, and academic resources. I was in charge of the frontend in React and the backend with Node.js and MongoDB. It includes features such as file uploads, categorization by course and faculty, user authentication, and a comment system.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It uses services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Sunat Api
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: The Web Scraping Customs API provides access to currency value data using advanced web scraping techniques. It offers detailed endpoint documentation to facilitate integration and use by developers and automation enthusiasts.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design that lists 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Problema del Camino minimo
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created to simulate and teach Dijkstra's Algorithm

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple page design featuring a profile card with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Say hi!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to hear from you if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write to me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
